item.title: HOME AFFORDABLE REFINANCE PLAN...AGAIN
item.author: Bill@MadTownMortgage.com
item.description: The President announced another revision to the Home Affordable Refinance Program; this program is designed to help borrowers who have not been able to refinance to lower rates on their mortgage because they owe more on their homes that the appraised value. This week I will share what information that is available so far on the program. Tune into Mortgage & Real Estate Radio at 9:05 CST on 106.7FM and 1670AM WTDY. check it out at www.MadTownMortgage.com. Thanks for tuning in!

item.title: #73 - You've Just Been TRIGGERED!
item.author: Bill@MadTownMortgage.com
item.description: Looking fo Insurance? Buying a car? Shopping for a new mortgage? Well, if your credit has been pulled, expect to hear from a WHOLE BUNCH of people you didn't even know existed - and will eventually wish DIDN'T. The Fair Credit Reporting Act allows credit repositiries to sell your personal credit information - to get you a competitive deal, of course - to companies that want your business. Fair enough - but HOW they try to get it is the problem. Listen to this enhanced expose on Trigger Leads and learn what they do - and how YOU ccan protect YOURSELF. The government won't be helping you just yet but Bill and Art will. Please listen to this impotant show - listeners wanted more, and we're delivering. Thanks.

Although the Federal Reserve estimates home owners have 36 times the net worth of renters, many folks still wonder if home buying is REALLY the way to go. We take a hard look at the topic, crunch a few numbers, and give you our answers here. Tune in. Thanks.

item.title: #62 - Will FHA Loans FIll the SubPrime Gap?
item.author: Bill@MadTownMortgage.com
item.description: Subprime mortgages are under attack from all fronts. Investors are withdrawing support, lenders are filing bankruptcy, programs are being eliminated, credit is tightening, and Congress is being pressured into action. So what do borrowers with less-than-perfect-credit and minimal downpayment money do? They look at FHA mortgages! FHA is kinder toward credit, is underwritten by "people," and has some terrific programs for purchases AND refinances. This episode of Your Home-Your Money will give you the goods on Federal Housing Authority loans. Join Bill and Art today.

item.title: #61 - MORTGAGE GOLIATH TROUNCED - LIve Interview with DAVEY
item.author: Bill@MadTownMortgage.com
item.description: This mortgage-gone-bad story is getting attention across the US as it applies to borrowers everywhere. According to an article in the Washington Post, Susan and Bryan Andrews of Cedarburg, Wisconsin refinanced their home in 2004 into what was explained - and reportedly documented - to be a 1.95% interest rate that was to be fixed for five years. It was not. The Andrews family decided to fight and eventually took the lender - Chevy Chase Bank - to court and WON, setting the table for a class action lawsuit by thousands of borrowers in the same boat. This is their story - and their caution - to the listeners of Your Home-Your Money as related in this excellent live interview.

item.itunes:summary: When a man with Money meets a man with Experience, the man with Experience gets the Money and the man with the Money gets Experience. ** A bit of a mixed bag awaits our listeners today as The Mortgage Guys discuss a few topics, including two of the most important documents in your mortgage lending life - the GFE (Good Faith Estimate) and the TIL (Truth in Lending). These two pieces of paper can define your entire borrowing experience - ignoring their significance can cost you THOUSANDS of dollars. So if you have a mortgage, need to get one, or are thinking of buying a home - catch this simulcast (WTDY and TalkShoe) and get some cheap, no-pain, no-cost experience. Worth dragging out the loan papers, this one...

item.title: #34 DebtSmart - Negotiating Your Credit Debt-interview with Scott Bilker
item.author: Bill@MadTownMortgage.com
item.description:
Why on earth are you paying 5%-10%-15%-even 30% credit card interest rates!? Do you think you can ever pay these things off? Do you want a break on payments? Is there ANYONE who can guide you through this mess? Yup, and he's right here - SCOTT BILKER. Scott -the author of "Talk Your Way Out of Credit Card Debt" - joins Bill and Art to share his wisdom and advice in this special phone interview. He has some amazing stories to tell and wisdom to impart.
Scott has helped countless Americans save cash and aggravation just by "talking" - using techniques perfected over 14 years. So if you want to save money (!?!) and reduce the high credit interest payments that lead to bankruptcy or foreclosure, tune in. Remember, Scott's from New Jersey and talks fast, so listen fast to avoid missing a single word from this Credit Debt Mastermind. Find more at www.debtsmart.com and, of course, www.YourHome-YourMoney.com
*****Hint: Psssst - This book would make a great gift for anybody over 12.

item.title: #32 - STRAIGHT TALK ABOUT CROOKED DEALS
item.author: Bill@MadTownMortgage.com
item.description:
A one-hour special linking "Straight Talk About Money" and "Your Home-Your Money Mortgage Radio"! Once again Bill and Art get to join Louise Googins of Googins & Anton financial in this special simulcast. Louise (a seasoned NPR interview) wants to know what the heck is going on with the mortgage industry and has asked us to be her source of truth and accuracy on her radio show. Her investors are getting fiscally confused and financially abused. She wants answers and so do they!
Immediately after Louise's show The Mortgage Experts dish the dirt about some really nasty behavior from both Local and Online Lenders - stuff our client experienced just this past week! It's Halloween Weekend and the Horror Stories don't all involve guys in hockey masks - quite a few wear suits, too. Bust out the barf bags - some of this behavior will sicken you. All tricks and no treats.

item.title: #30 Six Mistakes to Avoid when Obtaining a Home Mortgage
item.author: Bill@MadTownMortgage.com
item.description: You are constantly being trained via news media and advertising to look for your home mortgage - in the wrong way! The advertisers funding all this hype don't want to save you money - they want you spending more. Time to get smart and fight back! See those ads on home pages and emails and website? Online advertisers pay companies like Google up to $12.00 per click on those ads - $12.00! Do you really think online lenders are going to give you the best rate - or save you any money at all - when they (well, actually, you) are paying for thousands of clicks? Tune in to Bill Quigley and Art Blanchet and get real - real information, real tips, and real smart! We'll UNtrain you.

item.title: #29 LISTEN to the NICE LADY - A Home Inspection Can Save You Serious Money
item.author: Bill@MadTownMortgage.com
item.description: This Little Lady can save you Big Bucks (and maybe your life). By popular demand, The Mortgage Experts invite Kimberly St. Louis of A-Pro Home Inspections back for more discussion of the powerful service - for Buyer, Seller, and current Homeowner alike - of the residential Home Inspection. In today's softer real estate market, the Home Inspection can be a powerful negotiating tool for wise Buyers. For Sellers, the inspection can set you apart in the market place and tout the benefits of a safe, well-built home. For HomeOwners, well...there can be darker things in Your Home than just the inside of the fridge, things that endanger health and burn up Your Money. Time for due diligence - listen to our interview with Kimberly, share a few laughs, and make your own decision. Kimberly can later be reached for more info online at A-Pro.net/Madison.

item.title: #23 Home Buying for Regular People With Irregular Income - Tips and Advice
item.author: Bill@MadTownMortgage.com
item.description: As we complete our second simulcast with TalkShoe and Madison 1670, we'll be presenting a multitopic show with three distinct subjects - all about home ownership. Many folks DON'T haave perfect credit, a 9 to 5 regular job, or downpayment money, yet they still want a home. item.title: #22 RADON, ASBESTOS, and LEAD - OH MY!!
item.author: Bill@MadTownMortgage.com
item.description:
Nope. We're not in Kansas any more Toto - we're in Real Estate! Now it's time to find out what's more dangerous - the WIcked Witch of the West or Your House. To do that, you need a home inspection...
"I'm ALREADY paying for an appraisal - now you say I should pay for a Home Inspection?!?!" Welllll...after you listen to this this recorded interview with Kimberly St. Louis, a Certified Home Inspector with A-Pro Home Inspections (a-pro.net/madison), you may want to spring for it!
Kimberly talks to The Mortgage Experts about just what an inspection is, who benefits from it, and discusses the powerful information contained in the report. Whether you are buying a brand new yellow brick home or live in a century-old castle (flying monkeys and all), Kimberly says a home inspection might save you thousands of dollars and even uncover health and safety hazards (a little fire, Scarecrow?). Don't worry, Bill Quigley and Art Blanchet will get you all the info you need, and It won't cost you a tin', man.

item.title: #19 RENTING Can Be Hazardous to Your WEALTH!
item.author: Bill@MadTownMortgage.com
item.description:
This just out from the Federal Reserve: Homeowners compared to renters have thirty-six times the net worth - 36 TIMES! That's just plain sick, sort of like Bill Gates not picking up the tab at Mothers Day dinner! The OTHER Bill (Quigley) and Art (Blanchet) won't pay for your Mom's meal either, but the money you can save by listening to them sure could!
In this episode they share their opinions and solutions on RENT vs OWN - they also throw in some slick numbers and a couple of special tips that could help you - or someone you love - become a homeowner. AND you don't have to get a second job or eat Ramen noodles to afford it!
Take a listen and learn a little - The Mortgage Experts will help you solve your home buying problems.

item.title: #18 REAL ESTATE as an INVESTMENT - Interview with Lorne Tabba
item.author: Bill@MadTownMortgage.com
item.description:
The Mortgage Experts uncork the "Wisconsin Investment Genie" this morning as they bring the experience and advice of their special guest Lorne Tabba to the airwaves. Is real estate investment only for the High Rollers? Are we talking SFR, duplexes or high-rise tenament buildings? Shopping centers or suburban homes? We don't know!
Lorne is the President of the Southern Wisconsin Investment Club, so we figure he's El Presidente for a reason - let's find out. And, to add a little pressure, YHYM is in position to TalkCast this simulcast to the world as we finally get our casts in gear. Should be fun, so join us!

item.description:

The Mortgage Experts will be sharing an hour with the wise and witty financial investment counsellor Louise Googins as she hosts her show, "Straight Talk About Money" with us as guests. item.title: #3 Nine Steps to Buying a Home - Part 1
item.author: Bill@MadTownMortgage.com
item.description: An excellent show for First Time Hom-Buyers - and for step-ups, too. Buying a home - from concept to closing - is a Process. Homebuying is serious event and each step in that Process must be carefully considered and completed to avoid all the mistakes, traps, and snares. However, tens of thousands of homes are bought annually in this country by folks dumber than us, so while the process is daunting, it can be stress-free. Just tune in and listen carefully to the counsel in this episode...save some money, too! (We ALL like that.)

item.title: #2 PREDATORY LENDING - Don't Be a Victim!
item.author: Bill@MadTownMortgage.com
item.description: Where are you in the Mortgage Lending Food Chain? The Predatory Lenders are out there - and they are on top! They live in TV commercials, on your internet, in your email and sometimes on your block. They lure you in with cleverly worded ads and cutesy commercials, smooth talk and soothe talk you. Then when you are at your most vulnerable - they pounce - right on your wallet!!! Stop being somebody's lunch and listen to the insider info in this useful expose - you WILL save money and move up in the Lending Food Chain.
